title: Amid Ongoing Iran Protests, Congress Boosts Cultish MEK Exile Group
description:
Members of Congress from both sides of the aisle are backing a bill that endorses Maryam Rajavi, an Iranian opposition figure who leads the Mojahedin-e Khalq.

The post Amid Ongoing Iran Protests, Congress Boosts Cultish MEK Exile Group appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Israeli Army Battalion Puts U.S. Ban on Funding Abusive Units to the Test
description:
A former member speaks out about the unit responsible for the death of a 78-year-old Palestinian American.

The post Israeli Army Battalion Puts U.S. Ban on Funding Abusive Units to the Test appeared first on The Intercept.
